Born: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche ( 1844-10-15 ) 15 October 1844 Rcken ,  Saxony ,  Prussia
School: Anti-foundationalism Anti-consumerism Atheism Continental philosophy German idealism  Existentialism Anti-nihilism   Perspectivism Voluntarism
MainInterests: Aesthetics Ethics Metaphysics Ontology Philosophy of history Poetry Psychology Tragedy Value theory
